patterns: Tell me about the shipping options 🚚
What are the shipping methods available?
What shipping options do you have? ✈️
I need faster shipping! What can I choose? ⏩
responses: We offer two main shipping options: **Standard** and **Express**. 🚚 Standard shipping costs RM10 and takes 3-5 business days, while Express shipping 🚀 can get your items to you in just 1-2 days. How fast do you need your order to arrive?
For Standard shipping, it typically takes 3-5 business days, while Express shipping will get it to you within 1-2 business days! Need any help choosing? 📦✈️
Standard shipping costs RM10, and Express shipping varies depending on your location and items. Which one works best for you? 💸📦
We can check the status of your order! Just provide your Order ID or email address, and I'll help track it for you. 🔍📦

patterns: How do I return a product? 🔄
How do I return an item? 🔁
What's the status of my return? 🔍
Is there a fee for returns? 💵
Can I return something I bought online? 🖥️📦
responses: We have a **30-day return policy** on unworn items. It's super easy to return something! ♻️ Just visit our Return Center online, provide your order number, and we'll guide you through the process. Need help getting started? 😊
No worries, you can return any unworn items within 30 days. Just use our prepaid return label and drop it off at your nearest post office. 📮 How can I assist with your return today?
Return shipping is completely free! 🎉 You'll receive a prepaid label with your order. Simply pack your items, stick on the label, and ship it back to us. 📦
You can check the status of your return anytime. Just provide me with your return tracking number or order ID, and I'll get the details for you. 🔍✉️

patterns: Do your products come with a warranty? 🛡️
How do I claim the warranty? 📝
Can I claim a warranty on my product? 🔧
responses: Yes! All of our products come with a **1-year warranty** against manufacturing defects. 🛡️ Need to claim a warranty? Just let me know the product and issue, and I'll guide you through the process! 🛠️
We've got your back! 🛡️ Our products are covered for **1 year** from the purchase date. If anything's wrong, just contact us with your proof of purchase, and we'll take care of the rest.
To claim your warranty, just provide your receipt or proof of purchase along with details of the issue. I'll get everything set up for you! 📜
We offer extended warranties on select products. 🕒 Let me know which product you're looking at, and I can check if it qualifies for an extended warranty!

patterns: Can I buy gift cards online? 💳
How do I check my gift card balance? 💸
What are the available amounts for gift cards? 🎟️
Can I use a gift card for my purchase? 🛍️
How do I use a gift card? 🏷️
responses: Yes! You can purchase Adidas gift cards 🎁 directly from our website. They're available in RM50, RM100, RM150, and RM200 amounts. Need help with anything else?
Our gift cards 🎁 come in different amounts: RM50, RM100, RM150, and RM200. You can buy them online and send them as a gift to someone special! 💝
You can check your gift card balance 💳 by entering the card number on our website's balance checker. Need help finding the page? 🤔
To use your gift card 🎁, just enter the code during checkout, and the amount will be applied to your order. Got more questions? I'm here to help!

patterns: I want to cancel my order 🚫
The product I received is wrong 😓
Part of my order is missing 😣
The item I received is broken 😥
responses: If you'd like to cancel your order, you can do so within **24 hours** of placing it. 🚫 Just provide your order number, and I'll help you cancel it.
I'm sorry about the mix-up! 😓 Please share your order number, and we'll fix this by sending you the correct product right away.
Oh no, I apologize for the incomplete order! 😔 Let me look into it. Could you please provide your order number?
If your product arrived damaged 💔, we'll make it right! Please send us a picture of the item and your order number, and we'll get a replacement to you as soon as possible.
